name: Roasted Carrot Fries
description: Turn carrot sticks into fun fries. They have a slightly sweeter taste than potatoes and are just as satisfying. A great way to get kiddos to eat more veggies. Serve with Big Burger Sauce for dunking.

ingredients.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: Cut carrots into french fry sticks. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss with fry seasoning. Bake for 30 min or until tender.
Shake on more fry seasoning and add toppings, if desired.
tips: Serve your veggie fries standing upright in a teacup, or small stoneware bowl, accompanied by your favourite Epicure dip!
Experiment with other firm root vegetables, like parsnips, beets, sweet potatoes and yams. Cooking time may vary.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favourite.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.
